verifyKey.subject: Verify Your Key
verifyKey.text:
Hello {{name}},

please click here to verify your key: {{baseUrl}}/api/v1/verify?keyid={{keyid}}&nonce={{nonce}}

verifyRemove.subject: Verify Key Removal
verifyRemove.text:
Hello {{name}},

please click here to verify the removal of your key: {{baseUrl}}/api/v1/verifyRemove?keyid={{keyid}}&nonce={{nonce}}
